channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar

item.title: CVE-2021-24624|2024-08-03T19:35:20.275Z -- unknown -- mp3%20audio%20player%20for%20music%2C%20radio%20%26%20podcast%20by%20sonaar
item.description: The MP3 Audio Player for Music, Radio & Podcast by Sonaar WordPress plugin before 2.4.2 does not properly sanitize or escape data in some of its Playlist settings, allowing high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks
